article.headline: CS Northridge 82, Long Beach St. 78
article.story: LONG BEACH, Calif. (AP) -- Tremaine Townsend led Cal State Northridge with 18 points and 14 rebounds to guide the Matadors to a 82-78 win over Long Beach State Wednesday in a Big West Conference game The win for Northridge (18-6, 10-2) keeps them in sole possession of first place in the Big West. The Matadors lost key senior forward Calvin Chitwood seven minutes into the first half with a sprained right ankle. The extent of the injury is unknown. Northridge had a comfortable lead most of the second half. The Matadors' lead peaked at 66-51 with 8:57 to play. Long Beach State, however, chipped away at the Matador margin and trailed only 68-61 after 49er Greg Plater hit a three-pointer with 5:42 to play. Late in the second half Northridge got into serious foul trouble just as Long Beach State pulled to within 72-70 with 2:47 to play. Donovan Morris led the 49ers in scoring with 23 points.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
